thread.title: Dakota Johnson’s New Hair Color Is a Surprise at the Fifty Shades Darker Premiere
thread.title_full: Dakota Johnson’s New Hair Color Is a Surprise at the Fifty Shades Darker Premiere

title: Dakota Johnson’s New Hair Color Is a Surprise at the Fifty Shades Darker Premiere

organizations.name: fifty shades darker premiere dakota johnson debuts

text: Dakota Johnson Debuts a Striking New Hair Color at the Fifty Shades Darker Premiere February 3, 2017 3:20 PM by Sophie Schulte-Hillen Photo: Getty Images Last night, Fifty Shades Darker celebrated its Los Angeles premiere—an occasion for which Dakota Johnson embraced switching up her look with a fresh new hair color that knocked her beauty game out of the proverbial park. The ingenue-turned-box-office supernova exceeded expectations with a deep brunette dye job that revealed slightly sun-blanched, face-framing tips. Artfully blended extensions turned her shoulder-sweeping layers into a modern take on the French braid that was tugged apart just enough to add a little sexy, unstructured mussiness to the clean lines of her Valentino dress . From a look at the winning effect, there’s never been a better case for crossing into the dark side this month. In This Story: Dakota Johnson Recommended For You
